div.p: TO YOUR JOB IN TIME FOR
THE BULK OF THE BODY SEEMS
AND TAKEN HERE BY SOME FORCE
IT WAS QUITE A HIKE HERE.
I DON'T KNOW WHAT IT IS.
YEARS OLD WHEN I CAME HERE.
I WANTED TO DIE IN SPACE,
IF SO, YOU WEAR YOUR AGE
I'LL DO ANYTHING I HAVE TO
TO SAVE ALL OF OUR LIVES.
BUT IT HAS TO BE DONE.
ON THE HEADING WE'RE NOW ON.
IT IS WRONG TO KEEP US
TO BE AN ASTEROID BELT, SIR.
WE'LL DO IT THE HARD WAY.
YOU DO NOT HAVE THE POWER
OF THE SUN ON MY FACE.
WE HAVE A FEW THINGS TO DO.
CAN YOU GET A FIX ON US?
BUT EVEN IF YOU STAY HERE,
MEN AND WOMEN FOR A LONG TIME.
I KNOW THAT I LOVE HER.
